captions.text: (narrator) Previously on The Last of Us...

- (in game: man groans)
- There we go. Head shot.
Why does bad [bleep] always happen to them?

We need something 
smuggled out of the city.
(narrator) This time on The Last of Us...
All right, let's go get our guns.
Tess and the Queen of Fireflies.

She's the one who 
we were trying to get to first.

I'm running away from military 
because they're after her

and I'm sure that if we're with her,
they'll assume that we will...
I wonder what we have to go deliver.
I get mad at AI too easily over--

Something blew up while I was 
putting my face in barbed wire.
Why do you think I'm turning to you guys?
Oooh, the Fireflies got shot at.

I still can't hit these 
other people that I'm walking with.

I think that would be hilarious 
if I just could knock 'em out.

Can I grab this stuff?
Is that stealing?
Am I gonna get in trouble?

Do you need help?
You got shot at
and you're trying to do so much.

Damn, she is running pretty good 
for somebody who's shot.
Okay, so I gotta get there.
even though I know that's not your style.

I'm gonna get all the way 
over to that door,
shoot some people in the head.
We gotta sneak past some guards, but--
There's a big ass hole right there.
I wish I could run. Can I run?
Oh, she's, like, crouch running though.

- (Tess) I'll get this one.
- Justice waits for no one, private.

All right, guess I'm gonna 
have to shank this guy in his face.

Man, this guy just loves bashing 
people's faces into stuff.
How do I use my thing?
Let's go over to this one.
Oh, this one's gonna be easy.

Is this guy talking to himself?
What a weirdo.
That's what I think of you.
Then I'm gonna stab them in the neck.
Stab, stab them in the neck.

(Marlene) Seems like you 
are good for something.
Yeah, thank God I am here.

Amazing plays here by Josh, 
ladies and gentlemen.

It's, like, a two foot drop.
Come on, guys.
Oh, that's where I shot him.
And in here is maybe the Fireflies' base?
You make all the noise you need.
I can shoot people with an M4 or something.
(Joel) What the hell are we smuggling?

I don't think it'd be drugs.
I don't think it'd be that.

Maybe weapons or ration cards 
or something like that.
(Marlene) Just gimme a hand with this.
All right, I'm way ahead of you, girl.
You can't die because we need you!

You're recruiting 
kind of young, aren't you?

Aren't you a little young 
to be using that language?

- (Marlene) I got us help.
- Is that Miley Cyrus?
But I can't come with you.

There's a crew 
of Fireflies that'll meet you--

(Marlene) You had her off, 
come back, the weapons are yours.
Speaking of which, where are they?

Nope, you said you were 
gonna show us the guns.

We're not smuggling 
[bleep] until I see them.

You can verify the weapons.
I can get patched up.

But she's not crossing 
into that part of town.

This girl's a bad ass.
She can do what she wants.
(Marlene) I want Joel to watch over her.
I was close with his brother, Tommy.

Said if I was ever 
in a jam I could rely on him.
Look, just take her to then north tunnel

- Jesus Christ.
- She's just cargo, Joel.

So now I got a little girl 
instead of a big girl.

(Ellie) Whoa, I heard 
all the shooting, but...
Look at all these wanted people.

- (Ellie) Where are we going?
- (Joel) Up there.
That's what I wanna know too!

Okay, can we climb the ladder
or do we have to--
There's metal poles you could just step on.
Oh, I'm so good at this.

(sarcastically) You go ahead. 
Take your time.

Just stroll along.
We're not in a hurry.
Well, now she can get up. All right.

Gosh, she needs to be quicker 
or I'm gonna punch her.

(Joel) So what's the deal with you 
and Marlene anyways?

- (Ellie) I don't know.
- "She's my friend, I guess."

(Joel) You're friends with 
the leader of the Fireflies.
You're hanging with the wrong crowd.

- And I'm 14, not that that has--
- I'm 14 too.
(Ellie) Look, I'm not supposed to tell you

why you're smuggling me, 
if that's what you're getting at.

(Joel) You wanna know 
the best thing about my job?

To be honest with you, I give 
two [bleep] what you're up to.

- (Ellie) Well, okay.
- Well, we're getting along nice.
Come on, guys, don't start off like that.

- This is it.
- Cut scene action.
Well, what am I supposed to do?
I'm sure you will figure that out.

I'm pretty sure that if there's 
a zombie apocalypse,

That's the watch my daughter 
gave me, you little [bleep]!
I bet this world prematurely aged him.
You know, I've never been this close.

I feel like her and him are gonna 
get along just great in the end.
Can't be any worse out there.

What on earth do 
the Fireflies want with you?
We were just getting to the good part!
They always have to ruin it.
I saw the merchandise. It's a lot.

Oh, I wanna know what 
the Fireflies want with the kid!

(Joel) Let's just hope 
there's someone alive to pay us.
This rain is pretty ten out of ten.
The holes they have behind furniture...
I can see the top half of it behind it.
All right, so maybe--it's just a guess.
Maybe she is immune to this stuff? Maybe.
Who's waiting for us at the drop off?

She said there's some 
Fireflies that have traveled
all the way from another city.

- What is the deal with you?
- Yeah.

- You some big-wig's daughter?
- I don't even know who she is.
(Ellie) How long is this gonna take?

(Tess) If everything goes as planned,
we should get you to them
I always feel like I have to go like this

This military does a sucky job 
of sweeping cities
'cause, geeze, there are so many tunnels.

Now night is coming.
And there's a curfew,

so that means something 
bad is gonna happen.

No, am I gonna have to go 
on another shooting rampage?

How are we gonna do this 
with all the police?
I kinda want to see his daughter as zombie.
Then he's gonna have to kill her.
(Joel) This rain ain't gonna do us any good.

Yes, it is. It's gonna 
make all your food grow.
Where are we gonna go? In here?

- (in game: rain patters on roof)
- (gasps) I love that sound.

I just want to stay in here 
and listen to the rain.

That's exactly what it 
sounds like in the car.
We're not gonna do anything stupid.
(soldier) You scan 'em. I'll call it in.
We don't have an infection. I promise.
(soldier) This is Ramirez at Sector Twelve.
That is not a very good smuggler.

Look the other way.
We can make this worth your while.

She's the reason that everyone's gonna 
get killed, with her smart mouth.

She's infected. We're gonna 
do something about it.

- (soldier) Whats the ETA?
- (Ramirez) A couple minutes.

She's infected? 
Um, okay. Just kidding.

That'd be a good reason 
to skip school though.

- Fricking liar.
- It's three weeks old.
No. Everyone turns within two days.
Damn, so she's immune or something.
That's why she is so special.

She is the cure!
She is the cure!

She's the cure and she's 
a good, sarcastic little [bleep].
Grab the big gun and run.
Come on, grab the big gun!

We have to say goodbye today,
but come back soon

For new gaming every Sunday,
hit that subscribe button.
